title: Random Skin
body: Here's something strange: I got TPA Shen skin randomly and for free... I never ordered a TPA Shen skin... ever... it just... "appeared" a few days ago. And i'm sure I wasn't drunk when I got it because I don't drink and I certainly don't do drugs. Plus I don't even like TPA skins (no offense) But did it just happen because of an event or what?

replies.body: Mystery gift from someone, or did it really just appear with absolutely no message?
No message what so ever. Just appeared out of thin air.

This may have been a Mystery Gift - from what I understand, the pop up that let's you know that you received one hasn't been showing up all the time. 

If you check your purchase history, that should be able to tell you at least if you purchased it, and if not, it's certainly the case of a Mystery Gift.
